Subskills.name: Vaultshot
Subskills.description: Increases the damage dealt by vault.

Subskills.name: Multivault
Subskills.description: Vault now fires multiple projectiles in an arc.

Subskills.name: Rapidshot
Subskills.description: Increases the amount of projectiles fired when vaulting.

Subskills.name: High Leap
Subskills.description: Increases air time when vaulting. Vault can now go over hard terrain.

Subskills.name: Landing Strike
Subskills.description: When landing fire projectiles in a circle around you.

Subskills.name: Hunter's Aim
Subskills.description: Projectiles from vault now pierce and bounce off of terrain with increased damage and speed.

Subskills.name: iArrow
Subskills.description: Turn into a big arrow dealing damage to monsters on your path. Upon landing cause a big explosion pulse dealing damage to monsters around you.

Subskills.name: Wounding Shot
Subskills.description: Vault projectiles inflict bleeding on hit.

Subskills.name: Trail of Blood
Subskills.description: Increases damage dealt to bleeding targets.

Subskills.name: Explosive Trail
Subskills.description: Vault now leaves a trail of explosions with increased damage and area of effect.

Subskills.name: Leaping Cyclone
Subskills.description: Vault fires orbiting projectiles that fly in all directions.

Subskills.name: Safespace
Subskills.description: When landing from leap knock back all monsters around you and drop raining arrows on them.
